subject: Action required: You've been invited to join the Meta Media Agency at dashboard.join-agency-network....
description_text:
Xin chào,

 

   You've been invited to join Meta Media Agency at dashboard.join-agency-network.comMeta Agency invited you to join the Meta Media Agency at dashboard.join-agency-network.com business portfolio. Portfolios connect a business's Facebook Pages and other business assets so that you can manage them all in one place.Depending on the access that you're given, you can do things such as help manage Pages, Instagram accounts, ad accounts and people's assignments.This invitation will expire on November 29, 2025. You won't be able to accept the invitation after this date.You may need to log in with your managed Meta account if it's required by your organisation.View invitationLearn moreMeta Business Suite is a one-stop shop, where you can manage all of your marketing and advertising on Facebook and Instagram.Save timePlan, edit and schedule posts and stories ahead of time.Connect with customersRead and reply to messages and comments using a single inbox.Get resultsTrack what's working best with performance insights across Meta technologies.   

 

Trân trọng cảm ơn!
Đội ngũ Facebook



========================================
Thư này đã được gửi đến service@simsonn.com. Vui lòng nhấp vào liên kết bên dưới để hủy đăng ký nếu bạn không muốn nhận những email như thế này từ Meta trong tương lai.
